summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the acquisition by condemnation of certain property and property rights necessary for sanitary sewer purposes in Rainier Beach Addition; Sturtevant's Rainier Beach Villa tracts; Sturtevant's Rainier Beach Lake Front Tracts; portion of 75th Avenue South; and the 2nd Class Shore Lands adjoining said plats and vacated portion of 75th Avenue South; all as a part of certain additions and betterments to the existing municipal sewerage utility and providing payment therefor.
